item.description:
Hi Everyone - let's start the educational process of Enfield, shall we?

We will meet @2:00 PM at the intersection of route 220 and route 5 next Saturday, 8-15. Parking may be an issue, so please park legally in public areas.

Please make your signs more informative than degrading or critical. We are being called "THE CRAZIES" right now by mainstreem media, so let's show them intelligence and respectfulness. We can be assertive in an inspring way.

I would like to share information on constitutional rights, the dangers of big govt., candidates who will help promote common sense policies so people will start to think about who they will be electing in November.

Let's make a smart, effective, strategic impact !!!

REMEMBER:

"All warfare is based on deception. Hence, when we are able to attack, we must seem unable; when using our forces, we must appear inactive; when we are near, we must make the enemy believe we are far away; when far away, we must make him believe we are near." Sun Tzu, The Art of War

In Patriotism,
Carole
item.name: Saturday Weekly Mini "T" in Enfield
